Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: I've been using the Logitech MX Master 3S Wireless Mouse for a few weeks now, and it has completely transformed my computing experience, earning a full 5-star rating for its exceptional performance and design.The first aspect that stands out with the MX Master 3S is its ergonomic design. Logitech has clearly put a lot of thought into the shape and contours of this mouse. It fits perfectly in the hand, reducing strain during long periods of use. This is a significant factor for anyone who spends hours at their computer, be it for work or gaming.The ultra-fast scrolling feature of this mouse is a game-changer. It allows me to navigate through long documents or web pages with incredible speed and precision. The tactile feel of the scroll wheel is satisfying, and the ability to switch between ratchet and free-spin modes is a thoughtful addition that enhances usability.Wireless performance is another area where the MX Master 3S excels. The connection is stable and responsive, with no noticeable lag or dropouts. This reliability is crucial for a wireless mouse, especially when used for tasks that require precision.One of the standout features of the MX Master 3S is its customization options. The Logitech Options software allows for extensive customization of buttons and actions. This level of personalization improves workflow efficiency, as I can tailor the mouse to suit my specific needs and shortcuts.Battery life is impressive. It lasts for weeks on a single charge, and the quick charging feature is convenient, ensuring the mouse is always ready for use.The mouse's build quality is robust, feeling premium and well-constructed. The attention to detail, from the texture of the surfaces to the satisfying click of the buttons, reflects Logitech's commitment to quality.In conclusion, the Logitech MX Master 3S is a superior wireless mouse that combines ergonomic design, high-end performance, and customizable features. It's an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their productivity and comfort during computer use.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Amanda
Review: The Logitech MX Master 3S has transformed my productivity. Its ultra-fast scrolling is a game-changer, and the ergonomic design ensures comfort during long work sessions. With an impressive 8K DPI, tracking on various surfaces, including glass, is flawless. The quiet clicks are a nice touch, and the versatility with USB-C and Bluetooth connectivity makes it a perfect fit for different devices and operating systems. A top-notch wireless mouse for anyone seeking precision and comfort.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Perfect office productivity mouse. buttery smooth, comfortable, scrolls well and feels great.Usual Logitech quality control, no issues.Plug and play.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Keriakos
Review: Most recent Logitech mouse in a long line of their mice over the last 20 years. Well made, accurate and built to last. Packaging is much better these days with a lot less plastic.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Nick
Review: I recently purchased the Logitech mouse and I am absolutely in love with it! This product has truly exceeded my expectations in terms of both quality and performance.Firstly, the design of this mouse is sleek and modern, making it a great addition to any workspace. The buttons are easy to click and the scroll wheel is smooth and responsive. Additionally, the ergonomic shape of the mouse fits comfortably in my hand, allowing for extended use without any discomfort or strain.In terms of performance, the Logitech mouse is exceptional. It has a fast and accurate response time, making it perfect for both work and gaming. I have also noticed that the mouse tracks smoothly on a variety of surfaces, including my desk and a mousepad.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the Logitech mouse. It is a high-quality product that has significantly improved my computing experience. If you are in the market for a new mouse, I would highly recommend this one!

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: James Peek
Review: I bought these when I started a new job a few months ago. I work extensively with spreadsheets and engineering drawings.The MX Master 3S is my first ergonomic mouse and it has been a pleasure to use. It is comfortable, quiet, and feels absolutely premium.The only drawback I have come across is that the side scrollwheel can become unpredictable when you have many tabs open and not function as it is required to. My fix has been to launch the Logi software or switch the mouse on and off again. This will likely be patched out with a firmware update.This mouse is quite pricey, but it does what all high quality products do: make you forget about the money you spent once you start using it.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Ebaad Ali
Review: Love the ergonomics of this mouse, super comfortable for use all day. Great battery life, Ive only had to fully charge this once since receiving it. Highly recommend.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Ebaad Ali
Review: very comfortable and easy to use.  also has scroll bars and nice clicks.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Dylan James
Review: Had to replace mine as I left my other one somewhere and couldn't find it - Apart from the Amazon delivery making me stay home all day to share some stupid code with the driver. Cannot complain about the mouse but i'd buy it somewhere where I don't have to stay home all day waiting in the future

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Jai Schulz
Review: The most I've ever spent on a mouse prior to this was about $50 so I was very hesitant about dropping over $100 for this but I'm glad I did. Originally wanted to get the Apple Magic Mouse for the built in touch pad however never liked the ergonomics of it even though I have relatively small hands.Initially I felt that the MX Master might be a bit too big for my hands and I was close to returning it however after about 2 days I became used to it and now it feels very comfortable to use.The side scroll and thumb gesture button almost mimics the functionality of the Magic Mouse, allowing you to perform actions such as opening Mission Control, switch desktops etc.The scrolling is very smooth and you can easily switch between frictionless and ratchet scrolling. The frictionless scrolling is amazing and you can easily get through large documents with a simple flick, however I find that it is a bit sensitive so generally leave it in the normal mode which is still very good but feels more tactile.Only real negative I have for it is the rubberised area where your palm rests. It gets a bit dirty and can get easily scratched by an inadvertent fingernail as you switch between using the mouse and keyboard. Luckily it's easy to rub out however I think deeper scratches might leave a more permanent mark.Highly recommended especially if you use a Mac and want to retain the functionality of the trackpad but you don't like the ergonomics of the Magic Mouse.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Amanda
Review: Got one with a defective scrolling wheel, but the seller replaced it with a new one. Product quality is not worry-free.The customer service is five star though! Speedy shipping and prompt response! Thanks

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Dylan James
Review: The Logitech MX Master 3S stands out with its ultra-fast scrolling, ergonomic design, and the ability to track on almost any surface, including glass. Its quiet clicks and versatile connectivity options, ranging from USB-C to Bluetooth, make it a top choice for both Windows and Linux users. However, I found the battery life to be a tad shorter than anticipated. Overall, a great product but with slight room for improvement in the battery department.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: EW
Review: I really enjoy using this mouse, because my hand gets sore using a computer for work for many hours. But two things bug me about it:1. On a MacBook Pro with ProMotion screen, I cannot get it to scroll the image/website smoothly, despite adjusting all settings. Using the trackpad, the image moves smoothly. 🤷‍♀️2. Don’t get a white mouse. After a while, it WILL discolour despite best efforts to keep it white.

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome
Name: Louis D.
Review: I purchased this to replace my original MX mouse, and will say this is weighs nothing compared to my old MX - Which I don't like, as I tend to use too much force, and you need to be somewhat delicate with this one - but everything else, such as response time, click rate and all that BLAH BLAH BLAH is Amazing!So why not five stars ????Only reason I bought this (with exception that my current MX only works on cable) was the capability to connect to multiple platforms, such as iPhone, Android, PC or Mac . . . And guess what the place the selection button underneath the mouse so it becomes this pause, flip the mouse over and press a button three times :(Why such I big fuss . . . . I also own a Logitech PRECISION PRO Wireless Mouse, they have the same function, but the button on the SIDE, ease select with your thumb and off you go.Other than that great mouse and I suggest to turn on the power of the mouse / KB when you don't use it and you can use them for weeks without charging :)

Product: Logitech MX Master 3S - Wireless Performance Mouse with Ultra-Fast Scrolling, Ergo, 8K DPI, Track on Glass, Quiet Clicks, USB-C, Bluetooth, Windows, Linux, Chrome

Review: Good quality mouse, need sometime to get use to the shape and sensitivity but ok

Review: This was an upgrade from a MX anywhere mouse for home desk use. Sturdy quality build and better day to day long use fit for my hand.
